Title: reinterpretAsString
Description: This function accepts a number, date or date with time and returns a string containing bytes representing the corresponding value in host order (little endian). Null bytes are dropped from the end. For example, a UInt32 type value of 255 is a string that is one byte long.
x: value to reinterpret to string. (U)Int*, Float, Date, DateTime.
String containing bytes representing x. String.
